message.content:
cs.HC, cs.GR, cs.CV, cs.AR, cs.MM

The paper discusses the development of head-mounted projection displays (HMPD) for distributed collaborative augmented reality applications, which involves human-computer interaction (cs.HC), computer graphics (cs.GR), computer vision (cs.CV), augmented reality (cs.AR), and multimedia (cs.MM). The focus on social collaboration and 3D visualization also suggests a potential fit with the sub-categories of virtual reality (cs.VR) and human-centered computing (cs.HCI). However, since these are not explicitly mentioned in the abstract, they are less likely to be the primary sub-categories.
